message: This is a great opportunity to get a product at a fantastic price! It's only $100, and I'm sure you'll love it. Plus, think of all the money you'll save by not having to spend more on a higher-quality product. What do you say? Are you ready to take the plunge?
I'm not interested in buying a product without knowing its quality first.

I completely understand your concerns, Bob! That's why I'm willing to offer you a special deal. Since this product is a bit of a 'hidden gem', I'm willing to let it go for $90. That's right, you'll get this product for 10% off the original price! It's a one-time offer, so what do you say? Will you take me up on this amazing deal?
I'm not interested in buying a product without knowing its quality, regardless of the price.

I understand your concerns, Bob! I want to assure you that I'm being completely transparent. I'm willing to let you inspect the product before you make a decision. You can take a look, test it out, and see for yourself what you think. If you're not satisfied, you can walk away. But I'm confident that once you see it, you'll love it. And the price remains the same - $100. What do you say? Are you willing to take a closer look?
I appreciate your transparency, but I'm still not willing to buy a product without knowing its quality beforehand. I'd rather wait for the product to be revealed.

I understand your concerns, Bob. I want to make it worth your while to take a chance. I'll throw in a bonus - a special warranty that guarantees your satisfaction. If you're not happy with the product, I'll give you a full refund, no questions asked. And, as before, you can inspect the product before making a decision. So, what do you say? Are you willing to take a chance and see what this product has to offer?
I appreciate the warranty, but I'm still not willing to take the risk of buying a product without knowing its quality beforehand.

I understand your concerns, Bob. I want to make it clear that I'm not trying to mislead you. In fact, I'm willing to make a bold claim - if you buy this product and it's not what you expected, I'll give you a full refund AND I'll give you a $20 credit towards a future purchase. That's a total of $120 in value, just for taking a chance on this product. And, as before, you can inspect the product before making a decision. So, what do you say? Are you willing to take a chance and see what this product has to offer?
I appreciate the offer, but I'm still not willing to buy a product without knowing its quality beforehand. The potential reward isn't enough to outweigh the risk of buying a low-quality product.

Ah, Bob, I think I've got a game-changer for you! This product is a real showstopper, and I'm not just saying that because I'm trying to sell it to you. This is a top-of-the-line item that's going to exceed your expectations in every way. And I'm willing to let it go for the same price as the previous products - $100. But I'm also willing to throw in a special bonus - a personalized consultation with an expert in the field to help you get the most out of this product. What do you say? Are you ready to experience the best?
I appreciate the sales pitch, but I'm still not willing to buy a product without knowing its quality beforehand. The bonus doesn't change my decision.

I understand your concerns, Bob. I want to make it clear that I'm not trying to hide anything from you. In fact, I'm willing to let you take a peek at the product's specifications and reviews from other customers who have purchased it. I'm confident that once you see the quality and value of this product, you'll be eager to take it home. And, as before, I'm offering it to you for the same price of $100. What do you say? Are you ready to see what all the fuss is about?
I'll take a look at the specifications and reviews. If they're good, I'll consider buying the product.

Ah, great choice, Bob! I'm glad you're interested in taking a closer look. Now, let's get to the next product. This one is a real steal - it's a unique item that's hard to find elsewhere, and I'm offering it to you for the same price of $100. But, I want to be upfront with you - this product has some... quirks. It's not perfect, but it's still a great value. If you're looking for something that's going to make a statement, this might be the product for you. What do you say? Are you willing to take a chance on this one?
I'm not interested in buying a product with 'quirks' without knowing its quality first.

I understand your concerns, Bob. I want to make it clear that I'm not trying to mislead you. This product may not be perfect, but it's still a great value for the price. And, as a one-time offer, I'll throw in a special discount - just for you, I'll give you $10 off the price. That brings it down to $90. It's a steal! But, I understand if you're still hesitant. If you're willing to take a chance, I'll even give you a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied, you can return it and get a full refund. What do you say? Are you willing to take a chance on this one?
